oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: William T. Ward correspondence with Jeremiah T. Boyle, undated
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ward, William T., 1808-1878
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Undated correspondence from Union Army Brigadier General William Thomas Ward to General Jeremiah Tilford Boyle regarding the capture of a prisoner in Metcalfe county, Kentucky and movement of Confederate forces in Glasgow, Kentucky.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865
Confederate States of America. Army
